summary: Desktop search page redesign tested successfully. All core features working: sidebar layout with Search Stats (trending/recent), search bar in main content, single-column horizontal card layout with image on left and text on right, and navigation to listing details.

issues: Image placeholders show gray boxes (via.placeholder.com) for items without images - consider a better placeholder design

desktop_layout_with_sidebar.details: Desktop viewport (1920x1080) renders correctly with 280px sidebar on left and main content area on right

search_bar_in_main_content.details: Search input with 'Search for anything...' placeholder and green Search button visible in main content area

search_stats_sidebar.details: Sidebar shows 'Search Stats' section with TRENDING searches (test:13, laptop:10, iph:7, etc.), RECENT section (appears after search), and Saved Searches quick action

categories_in_sidebar.details: Categories section shows Auto & Vehicles, Properties, Electronics, Phones & Tablets etc. with icons

search_functionality.details: Search works - entering 'test' returns '20 results for test' with listing cards displayed

horizontal_card_layout.details: Search results display in single-column list with horizontal cards: image placeholder on left, text content on right including price (€), title, description, location with icon, date, and condition badge

card_elements.details: Each card shows: image area (left), price (e.g., '25 €'), Negotiable badge, title, description, location (Test City), date (2/11/2026), condition badge (new), and favorite button

result_navigation.details: Clicking 'Public Badge Test Item' card navigates to /listing/[id] detail page

category_navigation.details: Clicking Electronics category in sidebar redirects to /category/electronics with subcategories and filters

critical_code_review_comments: The data-testid attributes are present in the code (line 523: data-testid={`listing-${item.id}`}) but React Native Web may not expose them directly to standard DOM queries - this is a known limitation
Console warning: 'shadow*' style props are deprecated. Use 'boxShadow' - minor deprecation warning
